responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "9B127FC74E74A001BE75679A1DA51EAC", "Now that\'s the kind of follow through I like to see. Good work. Clean, sturdy materials, just what we needed. You\'ve earned your keep, and then some. As promised, the old mare\'s yours. She\'s not much to look at, but she\'s steady and she knows the paths better than most. Should make the hauling a bit less backbreaking. Keep at it and Hammer Rest just might stand a chance.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_GarrimHammersong_12_Response
